website_summaries.verdict: If you primarily want to mix a whey protein concentrate into recipes, you’ll appreciate this unflavored version.
pros: Lower amounts of carbs, fat, and sugars than many other powders on the market
Gluten-free formula that offers 25 grams of protein per serving
Beyond the unflavored formula, vanilla and chocolate options are available too
Price per ounce is very competitive
cons: Recipe consistency from batch to batch sometimes is a little off

customer_reviews.title: Good whey protein!
customer_reviews.text: Good whey protein. Mixes well in a shaker, and has good taste. This is unflavored, (which I prefer), so if you want a flavor to it, you need to add it yourself. I put it in unflavored almond/cashew milk and add a tablespoon of natural peanut butter. It's only whey concentrate, no isolate, and the only thing that I don't like about it, is the label doesn't list the BCAA's amounts. Other than that, it is a descent whey protein concentrate powder. The ONLY ingredient is whey protein concentrate (which I like), no added ANYTHING. Note to Nutricost: You need to list the BCAA's amount on the label. We LIKE that.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY - This product is not usable or safe I've foud broken pieces of plastic in powder.
customer_reviews.text: After receiving we've been adding a table spoon to our daily shakes after training. The other day I noticed broken plastic in my shake as I was drinking. I used a strainer to check the shake and and found several small pieces of plastic. The scoop was NOT broken. BUT THERE IS PIECES OF PLASTIC IN THE POWDER!!! I tried calling the number on the package and have NOT received a response. DO NOT BUY - This product is not usable or safe.
customer_reviews.author: PaperScissorRock

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great on its own or in smoothies!
customer_reviews.text: I use this unflavored whey protein in a couple of ways. Sometimes I mix it with water or milk for a quick protein drink. It shakes up very smooth with a blender bottle and tastes creamy with no funny flavors. I also love using it in smoothies! My favorite smoothie recipe (2 servings) is 2 scoops whey protein powder, 1 cup almond milk, 1 avocado, 2 large handfuls spinach or kale, 1 frozen banana, and 1 cup frozen mango or pineapple.
customer_reviews.author: Chef

customer_reviews.title: Great price and protein.
customer_reviews.text: Found it for $35. 73 scoops and 25g per scoop. Unbeatable. Got unflavored since chocolate was out. It tastes like powdered milk. I mix it with scoop's of Nesquik and milk. It's "ok". But if the price stays the same, I'll always buy this brand... You can check out the lean strength gains I get for this on Youtube: Super Negro Fitness EDIT: JUST BOUGHT ANOTHER TUB. LET'S GET IT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kwam

customer_reviews.title: Good, affordable protein supplement.
customer_reviews.text: Good, affordable protein supplement if you are a weightlifter. My recovery is much faster mixing up two protein drinks a day. Add to a cup of organic whole milk a scoop of this powder, some fiber powder, and frozen blueberries. Blend. It also mixes well with a spoon (or shaker) if you don't have a blender. Also, in Washington State, it is considered "Nutritional" rather than "Supplemental", so there is no sales tax.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I am on a low carb diet. I was looking for decently priced protein powder that also had a low carb count. This has 2g of carbs and fit the bill. Not only that but it tastes ok (leaning on good) and can easily be mixed into water. I had maybe two little chunks of protein powder for an entire 20oz bottle of water. Other protein powders I've used in the past, that had many more carbs, would have large clumps of powder. This is the easiest I've had a protein powder mix in. Over all I'm happy with this and will repurchase. Will help me meet my macros with protein.
customer_reviews.author: Samira

customer_reviews.title: Add some Coca and it's great
customer_reviews.text: Mixes with water better than any other protein powder I've had, especially those with sugar that make a muck at the bottom of your blender bottle. I add about a teaspoon of hershey's coca powder to it to give it some flavor and really balances everything out. This is the best whey protein out there, no soy or sugar!
customer_reviews.author: Vincenzo R

customer_reviews.title: Good protein.
customer_reviews.text: Good protein.. kinda sweet but that's cool I chug any ways.. it is not too thick and it mixes well.. I am on my 4th container... one lasts me about 4 to 6 weeks depending on my needs .. Good price for the amount of servings that u get.. i will continue to purchase this product... 👌
customer_reviews.author: chaniqua rabine

customer_reviews.title: Plain good protein
customer_reviews.text: Good neutral taste with no noted side effects. Mixes well with a wisk twirled between my hands, I imagine it would shake well or blend well. Great price. No extra ingredients. I've been using this brand for several weeks at one or two servings a day.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah L. Naylor

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, Strong Artificial Sweetner Taste
customer_reviews.text: Great price for what you're getting. I like everything about it except it has Sucralose... When I first shook it up in my blender bottle with water I took a swig and got a salty flavor followed by a weird bitter aftertaste and immediately recognized it as fake sugar. If they didn't put it in at all I would give this 5 stars but it overpowers the chocolate flavor. Please make a version without artificial sweetners or if you need add stevia or something. I'll suck it up and drink it since returns as easy as they are take too much effort.
customer_reviews.author: Hito

customer_reviews.title: I wish I can use this product for life
customer_reviews.text: As delicious as this product taste. As much as I would like to continue to use this product for life. The ingredient sucralose is detrimental to my health and body. But 71 one time servings of this stuff won’t hurt to bad. It’s the long term use of sucralose that will have an impact on you.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Actually tastes good!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Jarrow unflavored whey protein the last two times prior to purchasing this brand, and I was shocked at how much better this Nutricost was. First, it mixes better. Secondly, it tastes a whole lot better! I make chocolate milk for my parents and add a big scoop of whey protein. With the Jarrow, I could always taste a kind of sour milk taste. With this brand, I do not taste that at all. If anything, it makes a glass of chocolate milk taste almost like a milkshake. A tip -- if you are making chocolate milk, mix the dry whey powder with Nestles Quik powder before adding the milk. It makes the whole thing easier to mix!
customer_reviews.author: K. Fortier

customer_reviews.title: Please Read This If Unsure On Wether To Buy Or Not
customer_reviews.text: I know alot have been reading reviews about how people have been finding pieces of plastic like material and what not but let me give you my honest opinion, I purchased this protein because I am very acne sensitive to Soy and sucralose so I buy the unflavored protein and so far my acne has been under control not only that I have not seen or tasted any small bits of plastic like substances or anything unusual so my recommendation is to at least by the unflavored protein and go to the store and buy some sort of flavored powder that you can add to the protein yourself other than that that's all I have to say about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ely

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste and Value!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product as a replacement for the plant-based Spirutein brand, the price of which was recently hiked to $80. This Nutricost whey protein (vanilla flavor) tastes great. I mix it with high protein Fairlife brand milk. I find adding about 1/4 teaspoon of baking soda to the milk (before adding the protein powder) really helps dissolve the powder using a spoon to stir the mix. I often add a teaspoon or two of PB Fit brand peanut butter powder to boost the protein content even further. This is now my go-to protein powder and will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is Great Unflavored Protein
customer_reviews.text: It is hit or miss if the protein out there has fillers, artificial sweeteners, or general sugar substitutes. This protein is clean, and does not have any of the undesirable sweetener additives. It is a great addition to smoothies, because if boosts the protein in them without adding much flavor, and does not add unwanted fillers.
customer_reviews.author: lberhold

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Mixes well and tastes fine. I use the unflavored version and add Hershey's cocoa to it. When I mix it, I use 1-3 teaspoons of sugar to sweeten depending on the amount of mix I am using. Cheaper than many others and works just as well.
customer_reviews.author: BHP940

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I just wish Amazon would kindly recall which products I've already reviewed. Nevertheless, this product is great. I've been using it for at least a year and the value is great. As far as I'm aware, it's the purest and cheapest whey protein on Amazon--that is, if you purchase the natural, unflavored whey protein as opposed to the flavored variety, which I believe have artificial sweeteners in them.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. T

customer_reviews.title: Gains as easy as one scoop
customer_reviews.text: First of this brand caught my eye because of such little ingridients and thats truly amazing, no additives to increase or decrease this blablabla just straight up protein and great tasting not the best tasting, but overall a good smooth taste,i usually mix it with oatmeal or coffee in the morning and is amazing ! Pros-solid ingridients,awesome taste,great calories Cons-could use a cooler label,scoop was way far down,could be sweeter
customer_reviews.author: Rami

customer_reviews.title: Great protein
customer_reviews.text: Mixes pretty well into coffee as a protein boost to start the day, and also mixes quite well in a shaker, and even better in the portable blender bottle I bought. Been using this for about a year, and bought 8 tubs of this stuff in that time. No issues, and it really seems to do the trick. I'm an avid weight lifter, and highly recommend this. Love that there aren't any added ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Nolan Collins

customer_reviews.title: Excellent source of Whey Protein
customer_reviews.text: I use the Whey Protein Concentrate to mix one glass of one percent milk, one whole avocado, two small rip bananas, and two normal scoops of this powder in a blender as either a morning breakfast or evening 'dinner' after work meal. Sometimes, I'll even add 1/2 cup of Greek Yogurt. It's filling...not hungry after one or two glasses. Using this powder is an easy way to easily consume various healthy fruits, because otherwise, I'd never eat an avocado by itself...but drinking this 'super food' is easy!
customer_reviews.author: DaveH

customer_reviews.title: will buy again
customer_reviews.text: like the price, the taste is good not great. much better when mixed. will buy again. good protein shake
customer_reviews.author: Bob Temp

customer_reviews.title: Awesome protein powder
customer_reviews.text: I lift weights and I needed an inexpensive allergy friendly powder I could use to supplement muscle growth. This stuff rocks. As others have said, the flavor of it is a bit like powdered milk. I don't really mind it, especially as I usually add it to a smoothie with other flavors. I've had it for almost 3 months and still haven't run out, this stuff is an incredible deal for the size and price!
customer_reviews.author: hatchibomitar

customer_reviews.title: Skin breaks out.
customer_reviews.text: Used for keto diet. Taste & texture good. But repeatedly caused severe itching and skin break outs. I saw similarly priced (per pound) at Costco and I don't have to wait 3-5 days for "free 2 day" Prime member delivery "benefit."
customer_reviews.author: K Cho

customer_reviews.title: Creamy texture and mild sweet flavor
customer_reviews.text: We tried a few different brands but the end have decided to stick with this protein powder. The texture is smooth and creamy. I like to add fruit and some spinach so prefer something with a mild taste, there is no aftertaste like other brands I have tried and as for results my husband has leaned out and built more muscle since starting this (I was switching brand so hard to see any direct change other than enjoying my smoothie more).
customer_reviews.author: Kaylie

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I need; a protein supplement at a fair price, without all the BS fluff ingredients and marketing gimmicks. The ingredients are simple, not some weird science project. And what do you know, I've been using it for a few weeks and my muscles are still there!
customer_reviews.author: Clay

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Tasty! I had purchased designer whey for a long time but when I tried using it to create bars or truffles the texture felt almost waxy and felt extra sticky. I wanted to look into finding a replacement and I think this is it. Vanilla is pretty sweet, and I haven't tried the unflavored or chocolate.
customer_reviews.author: Locness

customer_reviews.title: Contain sucrose
customer_reviews.text: This contains sucrose. Searched high n low for the best protein powder, n thought this s close, however, didnt expect it to contain sucrose... It wasn't listed, sort of disappointed. Taste is ok, cold beverage mix wo much clumping. On to my search for another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Player20190101

customer_reviews.title: i don’t recommend this protein.. make me feel sick.
customer_reviews.text: i have been drinking protein shakes 3 years and this one just make me feel sick, i saw that contains ingredients that are not too healthy i don’t recommend this protein at all..
customer_reviews.author: AlanF

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice protein powder. Was using the NOW Sports unsweetened whey concentrate prior to this and I will say that I prefer the taste of that one over this. This one doesn't taste bad though and I'm sure I'll get used to it. Mixes well into smoothies, which is how I use it. I switched because this one is cheaper and I will say that you can't beat it on price.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Cook

customer_reviews.title: Unflavored high protein drink all good
customer_reviews.text: I use this to mix with my Vitamin World chocolate powder. I used to drink the VW full concentration but after it was reformulated it doesnt taste good. This works well. I have a difficult stomach and lots of products set it off. This one doesn't. I am on my third 5 pounder now.
customer_reviews.author: Roger W.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it. Just buy it if you’re considering
customer_reviews.text: I get an allergic feeling whenever I take whey protein. I got this because I wanted to skip the overpowering sugary flavor of all other flavored protein powders, and was PLEASANTLY surprised to find that my throat didn’t swell up. Guess it was just the artificial garbage companies put in their flavored shakes. I have ordered this product twice and consider myself a lifetime customer. I actually prefer the flavor of whey alone. I also put my own stuff in the shakes like beet or carrot juice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got it for vegetarian parents.
customer_reviews.text: Parents are vegetarians and are missing out on protein. I got them this and they love the taste. They usually drink half and put it in the fridge and come back hours later with it still broken up /not clumped and are able to drink it.
customer_reviews.author: JustAGuy

customer_reviews.title: Decent protein!
customer_reviews.text: I typically bought Jarrow unflavored 2lb unflavored whey but the price has gone up. This is a great substitute - it blends well, tastes just fine, and is 5lbs for a very decent price. I will definitely continue to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: This blends well and doesn't change the flavor of my smoothies. I use this every morning. I am happy with the purchase. I am somewhat concerned with what the ingredient quality may be because it is so cheap, but it just seems like it's pure whey protein.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Great Product-As Far as I Can Tell
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting. However, at the microbiological level, I cannot comment on its effectiveness. Therein is the problem with rating these sorts of products. Most only comment on flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Mason

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Tastes terrible. I tried to give it away at work. Everyone said it tasted chalky. Nobody would take it. I ended up throwing 90% of it away. I couldn’t even tolerate it long enough to use it up. If you don’t care about the taste, it’s a great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Unflavored finally!
customer_reviews.text: Sweeten to taste if you like. Been looking for unflavored products for a while since some are so overpoweringly sweet with artificial sweeteners. It mixes well, and the flavor is what I'd expect--blander than milk, which I'm fine with. I wish it had some BCAAs actually.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: The blending power I give a 3 only because you need some sort of mixer/blender for it to incorporate fully. The flavor is awesome. The texture is smooth. I will happily be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Anonny Mouse

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, Great Flavor
customer_reviews.text: Bought 5-lb Chocolate, and I'm very pleased. The flavor is better than expected, and the price/oz is great. It's not as assimilable as some other powders I've bought, but it's not bad. Being whey concentrate, not isolate, it has a creamy, pleasant texture once mixed.
customer_reviews.author: Luigi

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several different brands of unflavored whey protien powder; this is the best one for the price. Neutral flavor, dissolves quickly and completely. Great price (2 lbs. for $22).
customer_reviews.author: GfromNY

customer_reviews.title: This beta alanine is grade A and a great deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: "So my review of this beta alanine powder would be a 5 out of 5. I am a chemistry major in college right now so I understand just what beta alanine is supposed to do and how it does it. This beta alanine is grade A and a great deal for the price. Your company have everything for great prices. Once im done with this bag i will definitely re-up on some more."
customer_reviews.author: david delgado

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Not much clumping to deal with, good quality for price, my only issue with it is the after taste. Even that is definitely nowhere near as bad as other protein shakes I've tried. So overall a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Ordering again & again
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite protein powder. Just ordered my 2nd tub. Some powders make me feel sick like a nauseous feeling (maybe it's just me) but this one doesn't, and it mixes very well!! Others will have lumps. I first had the unflavored which doesn't taste good alone but I like to put almond milk and cinnamon then it tastes delicious. I'm getting the chocolate now. The amount of protein you get for the price - can't beat it. Try it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good, a little on the sweet side
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. It's all whey protein, no isolate. I tried the vanilla for a little flavor to offset the kale I usually add to my smoothies, I had been using unflavored whey protein. It tastes great, but it's very sweet. One scoop per the serving suggestion overwhelms the balance from the kale, it's palatable but I'd prefer it didn't have quite so much sucralose added.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Doherty

customer_reviews.title: Get this if you want unflavored Whey protein.
customer_reviews.text: I got this when I was searching for an unflavored protein powder. I have been thoroughly impressed by the price and the quality. It’s shocking that unflavored whey protein is not as common as it should be. These guys have done a great job. The best whey protein that you can buy, if you want unflavored. Can’t beat the cost or the quality. Most other protein is way too sweet. This is perfect and mixes well with everything. Cannot recommend this protein enough. Must buy.
customer_reviews.author: Darth Nosto

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive.. Blends well. Doesn't taste bad.
customer_reviews.text: Just a good whey protein source. ? No taste issues and blends well. Cost efficient. If I can keep up with my work out goals I'll buy it again. The scoop was kinda buried but they usually are. It did have one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The perfect protein powder
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for an affordable protein supplement with no added ingredients and finally found this about a year ago and have been ordering it every since. A lot of the whey and plant based protein powders I have used in the past are sweetened with sucralose, and had additional ingredients like anti-caking agents and flavoring which made me feel bloated after use. This has none of that. Ingredients: whey protein. That's it. If you want an affordable protein supplement that won't leave you feeling bloated, give this a try.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Taste good
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this stuff. Great price and he says it taste better then most of the other shakes and it’s cheaper. We ordered the unflavored one as well, he adds a banana to it and it’s good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Catrina

customer_reviews.title: Unflavored!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the unflavored, as I wanted to mix my own stuff in. Only has whey protein, no soy, no artificial sweeteners or any of that other garbage. I mix it with matcha tea powder, raw honey, and milk! Use it as a meal replacement. Thank you for making a clean product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY! Contains Acesulfame Potassium (Know to cause cancer)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i enjoy this protein
customer_reviews.text: i use this protein for my daily green smoothies. I blend with my daily supplements everything finishes very smoothly. i am glad to purchase a product with no flavor, no aftertaste. i tend to break out with consumption of a dairy product, no blemishes what so ever. i've been taking product for over 3 weeks and would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: iiasha gaffney

customer_reviews.title: ENTIRELY TOO SWEET!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to use as an ingredient in protein shakes and smoothies. When combined with other sweet ingredients like milk, bananas, and oranges the sum total sweetness is overwhelming. I re-ordered the unflavored version which does not have the sucralose sweetener added.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lewis

customer_reviews.title: I love the taste it's really has a vanilla taste
customer_reviews.text: I love the taste it's really has a vanilla taste. Put it in a smoothie and it was great. Better taste than the designer whey I just finished so I will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: dee

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality whey protein
customer_reviews.text: I bought this protein a while back and so far I’m very happy with my purchase. Item arrived fast and in good conditions. Now when it comes to the flavor, it truly is unflavored and you could add it to pretty much any beverage without altering its flavor. It is also very easy to dissolve and does not make me feel bloated or full afterwards. I usually only drink one scoop after my morning workout. I’m very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Vassily

customer_reviews.title: Clumpy mess
customer_reviews.text: This product is really bad- unfortunately it took me so long to try it that the return window closed on me. It crumbed up in my coffee into discussing un-dissolving clumps. I dumped the coffee!!! I don’t think it will do any better in any other liquid — I am stuck with it thou so I will keep trying
customer_reviews.author: Eslam Metaweia

customer_reviews.title: this is a great product, easily mixes and you get a huge ...
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the Whey protein Isolate in March, and re-ordered the same item from our Amazon list this Month when our supply was low. What arrived was the Whey Protein Concentrate. Just want seller to be aware of this minor mistake. I know that the Concentrate is slightly inferior compared to the Isolate, but not so much so that I felt I needed to send it back. Just a heads up. Otherwise, this is a great product, easily mixes and you get a huge amount of product for a fair price!
customer_reviews.author: Duke

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great even mixed with water
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great even mixed with water. mixes well, good profile, simple ingredients, great price point. My new go to protein!
customer_reviews.author: Shaina

customer_reviews.title: Tastes unappealing, but good protein booster
customer_reviews.text: I don’t knw what unflavored is supposed to taste like, but this is NOT it ... it tastes like maximum flavored powdered milk. I have to force myself to chug it. It helps me get my protein in, but it tastes so bad.
customer_reviews.author: Navii

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Have been using whey protein powder for some time and this was the only product that made me extremely gassy. I stopped for a week and restarted and literally that day was incredibly uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Prague

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting
customer_reviews.text: Unless you mix this with your fruit smoothies. Unbearable! Took it to the dumpster after a few month sitting in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Declan Amatus

customer_reviews.title: Blah
customer_reviews.text: Very gritty. Taste like a watered down milk shake even with Milk it's still blah. Not our fave tasting by far
customer_reviews.author: Cns

customer_reviews.title: Great protein shake :)
customer_reviews.text: Great protein shake, it doesn't have that very sweet protein shake when you taste it. Overall I really like this protein shake a lot. I'll buy another one, and recommend to anyone who needs a great protein shake :)
customer_reviews.author: Briana C.

customer_reviews.title: It's a little sweet for me.
customer_reviews.text: This isn't a bad powder. I just didnt care for the taste. It's a little too sweet/chocolate for me.
customer_reviews.author: KeepItGreen

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Amazing protein powder. It is flavorless, dissolves really easy, amazing quality. Nutricost got my heart as all of their products are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Bruna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: blends well and doesn't taste anything until you add your own flavors...thank you for a low-cost nutritional supplement
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: With the Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to mix in with my smoothies. Keeps me full longer. Seems to make them taste fluffier if that makes any sense, that's the only way I can explain it.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I like that this product has no sweeteners. It blends nice and smooth. I will reorder this item.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: I bought the vanilla flavor. I use unsweetened almond ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the vanilla flavor. I use unsweetened almond milk and a scoop of PBFit - its delicious, and it's very low carb, which is what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: cmmart29

customer_reviews.title: Taste is Neutral
customer_reviews.text: No weird taste. I like this stuff. Really needs a blender or immersion blender to mix it into the drink well, but is no off taste like some protein powders.
customer_reviews.author: Andi F.

customer_reviews.title: Great unflavored protein, but price went up
customer_reviews.text: A pure unflavored protein, mixes well, no funny business, but the price has gone up nearly 10% in the last month and it no longer ships next day with prime. Other brands now come into parity with it and make the decision to buy this brand less straightforward. Will monitor to see if price and delivery goes back to where it was.
customer_reviews.author: Rainer

customer_reviews.title: its ok
customer_reviews.text: taste isn't wonderful.... even though it says its unflavored. If mixed in a strong flavored drink, its fine
customer_reviews.author: Russ Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Really like this
customer_reviews.text: Protein ususally tastes like crap and this one is has no flavor but it does chanhe the texture of the smoothie. Overall the best you can get for the money id say.
customer_reviews.author: roger

customer_reviews.title: Great for bariatric patients.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for... easy to add to recipes or drinks, unflavored powder. A great addition to bariatric diets.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn A. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Good price since protein as of lately is over priced. The ingredients are good except for the sucralose which is not good for you. The taste is not as good as the others I have tried. But since it does the same as the high priced proteins it’s a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Jarrow increased it's price $10 for a 16 ounce size, so won't be buying that anymore. This is the same stuff. I mix it with a chocolate protein shake I get at Sam's Club in packs of 24.
customer_reviews.author: D.G.

customer_reviews.title: Acne
customer_reviews.text: Stop eating dairy buy the pea protein it costs the same for more servings this nasty milk product will give you bodily acne n mess up your skin in general
customer_reviews.author: Sammyhdhdh

customer_reviews.title: Shop around
customer_reviews.text: Not enough protein and should have stevia for a sweetener
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: I love this product, and use it daily!
customer_reviews.text: Good flavor, great nutrition supplement/meal replacement. I add it to my morning coffee!
customer_reviews.author: P. Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Good and good value.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say. It is tasty vanilla flavored. Good protein content. I like it and would buy again. It has sucralose in it so if that's not your thing then you may want to look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Sean S.

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and dependable
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find unflavored protein in stores. Never been let down by this protein powder.
customer_reviews.author: Koala

customer_reviews.title: It mixes great which is so important me
customer_reviews.text: My first try of this product, I’ll buy again. It mixes great which is so important me. It doesn’t have bcaa and some of those extra products but good protein and price.
customer_reviews.author: mike perdue

customer_reviews.title: Just get it.
customer_reviews.text: You get a great amount of servings. If you mix with milk it doesnt change the taste. I use it before bed with my cereal or as a meal replacement with strawberry syrup if I have a busy day at work.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew E

customer_reviews.title: Multiuse
customer_reviews.text: Pre-bariatric surgery. This is perfect for adding a little in all of your drinks and meals. Or make protein jello shots!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Lamarca

customer_reviews.title: ... baking and the unflavored version is one of the better ones I've found in not leaving some obvious weird ...
customer_reviews.text: I use it for baking and the unflavored version is one of the better ones I've found in not leaving some obvious weird after taste.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I mix it in with oatmeal or milk. Has little to no effect on taste. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan D

customer_reviews.title: Great value for quantity and quality
customer_reviews.text: Just as expected, 5 lb for just under $40 is a great deal. Very fast delievery too.
customer_reviews.author: Duke T

customer_reviews.title: Best unflavored protein I've had in 30 years
customer_reviews.text: I mixed it with about a cup of fruit, a handful of greens, tbs of flax, and coconut water and it was so much better than all the other proteins I've tried in my smoothies over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Very good protein
customer_reviews.text: Very good tasting protein, no added fillers, no bloat will buy again
customer_reviews.author: bm

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend the unflavored whey. You can add it to almost any recipe to increase protein intake. I’ve been using this protein for over a year and i love that i can add fruit and veggies to smoothies without it being overly sweet or mixed with other flavors. The possibilities are endless!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like this protein powder
customer_reviews.text: I really like this protein powder! Great taste for the cost. I have IBS and it does not upset my stomach! Definitely will purchase this again!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Little

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product is excellent. Not sickly-sweet, just right (the unflavored) like whole milk. Mixes well with cold water. Good Price.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Great price and very little ingredients. Got the non flavored one and it doesn’t taste that bad. Very happy with the product
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Very clumpy. Good for price.
customer_reviews.text: Clumps up and is really hard to get unclumped, no matter how you shake. Better when in blender or if used with a hot liquid (coffee). Good for price but not very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca K

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Appears to mix well. I like the fact it is unflavored as this allows for more taste options.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Not Unflavored
customer_reviews.text: This is not tasteless. It is not gritless. It is not odorless. You have to work hard to cover the flavor. I would like to return this product.
customer_reviews.author: Beloved

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting product and the price is right. I'd definitely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: PatrickJ

customer_reviews.title: Tasteless, finally!
customer_reviews.text: I do not taste this powder in my smoothies which I will be forever thankful for!
customer_reviews.author: kade scott passman

customer_reviews.title: Good Protein supplement
customer_reviews.text: Has every thing I am looking for in whey Protein
customer_reviews.author: POPs

customer_reviews.title: Taste way too sweet
customer_reviews.text: I loved the price and the reviews buuuut, the flavor (vanilla) was God awfully sweet. I really struggle to use this whey powder. Sucks because I bought the 5lb-er trying to save money. NOT worth it. Spend an extra 20$ and get something you don't cringe drinking.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Edwin Workman Jr

customer_reviews.title: Good taste and quality.
customer_reviews.text: The taste is good even though it is unflavored. It is easy to disolve even in cold water. It is great as post workout drink.
customer_reviews.author: Teal'c

product_meta.title: Nutricost Whey Protein Concentrate (Unflavored) 5LBS
feature_bullets: High Quality, Undenatured, Whey Protein Concentrate
5LBS of Whey Protein Concentrate Per Bottle
Made in a GMP Compliant, FDA Registered Facility
